con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="MemberWS" targetNamespace="http://soap.sample.ninjav.org/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="http://soap.sample.ninjav.org/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:ns1="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://soap.sample.ninjav.org/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="listAllMembers" type="tns:listAllMembers"/> <xs:element name="listAllMembersResponse" type="tns:listAllMembersResponse"/> <xs:element name="member" type="tns:member"/> <xs:element name="register" type="tns:register"/> <xs:element name="registerResponse" type="tns:registerResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="listAllMembers"> <xs:sequence/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="listAllMembersResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="members" type="tns:member"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="member"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="email" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="id" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="phoneNumber" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="register"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="arg0" type="tns:member"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="registerResponse"> <xs:sequence/> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Exception" type="tns:Exception"/> <xs:complexType name="Exception"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="message" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="listAllMembers"> <wsdl:part element="tns:listAllMembers" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="listAllMembersResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:listAllMembersResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="registerResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:registerResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="register"> <wsdl:part element="tns:register" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="Exception"> <wsdl:part element="tns:Exception" name="Exception"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="MemberWS"> <wsdl:operation name="listAllMembers"> <wsdl:input message="tns:listAllMembers" name="listAllMembers"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:listAllMembersResponse" name="listAllMembersResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="register"> <wsdl:input message="tns:register" name="register"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:registerResponse" name="registerResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="tns:Exception" name="Exception"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="MemberWSSoapBinding" type="tns:MemberWS"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="listAllMembers"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="listAllMembers"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="listAllMembersResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="register"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="register"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="registerResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="Exception"> <soap:fault name="Exception" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="MemberWS"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:MemberWSSoapBinding" name="MemberWSPort"> <soap:address location="http://monster:8080/SampleSOAPApp/MemberWS"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

con:config.con:query: insert into Member (id, name, email, phone_number) values (0, 'John Smith', 'john.smith@mailinator.com', '2125551212')
